title: Has anyone noticed the drop in resolution of lock/home screen wallpapers on pixel 5?
content: The pixel 5 wallpapers on both home and lock screen seen to be of a lower resolution than the original images in the wallpaper app or in the Photos app. I've tried rebooting but the problem persists. Has anyone noticed this? It's a bit unsatisfying when you want to see a crisp wallpaper...
